actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section III(a) of title 38, United States Code, relating to the payment of travel expenses for persons traveling to and from Veterans' Administration facilities.

summary.text: Provides, relating to travel expenses of persons going to and from a Veterans' Administration facility, that in no event shall the per diem rate for meals and lodging be less than $20 or the mileage rate be less than the current Department of Transportation estimate of the average costs of operating an automobile. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 111(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section III(a) of title 38, United States Code, relating to the payment of travel expenses for persons traveling to and from Veterans' Administration facilities.
